name: AnagrApp Cup - Word Brain Game
description:
AnagrApp Cup is the most challenging and addicting word puzzle game!
Keep your mind sharp and improve your vocabulary, concentration and spelling skills while having fun.

The rules are very simple. The aim of the game is to find all the words.
You can reveal hidden words by tapping on the letters one by one, or by sliding your finger from one letter to another.

FEATURES:
- It’s a free App that challenges your memory, attention, language, and mental agility
- Contains no ads at all
- Enjoy the game at your own pace without any time limits
- More than 1000 levels, (from 3 to 13 letters)
- Easy to play but challenging to master
- Clean and uncluttered look
- Want to check previous levels? Go back to the Level List and play again
- No Internet connection? No problem, you can play AnagrApp Cup anytime, anywhere
- Play in 10 different languages: English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Swedish, Norwegian, Dutch and Russian. Each progression in each language is preserved.
- Challenge yourself and train your brain
- Excellent word game for improving your anagram skills
- Mind game for all ages

EXTRA:
Daily brain training
Monday
Tuesday
Wednesday
Thursday
Friday
Saturday
Sunday
Play any day, anytime, anywhere, alone, or with friends and family.
All levels are accessible from the start.

NOTE:
- More than 1000 levels are waiting for you. New levels are added during application updates.
- If you get stuck, use your collected hints to reveal a letter in one of the words to find.
- The word library is rich. Don't forget that verbs in all tenses are words too!

AnagrApp Cup is the latest top rated word game from the creator of the HIT app AnagrApp.

Play, spell and learn at the same time. DOWNLOAD AnagrApp Cup to TRAIN your vocabulary and become a word master for FREE!

It’s your turn to play now!
How many words will you be able to find?
